channel.title: Books
channel.description:
Uh can someone tell me how to make it so when you you click a book a menu pops up (like the one you get at most serevrs when you log in) i really want this becuase im making a quest. Also can anyone tell me how to form spawn? (also for my quest)
-thanks
www.scrapscape.smfforfree2.com

item.title: Books
item.dc:creator: @mr_monkey mr monkey
item.description:
@mr_monkey wrote:

Thanks, now ive made an item that teleports you to a certain place and deletes the item, how do i make it so that if your wearing a certain weapon it doesnt delete item?

Read full topic

item.title: Books
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

Argh, let me, stupid non-helpers…
Find

case 2520

press enter after the break and add

case ....: } Menu(); } break;
The case … is the case - and then the object/item ID (item in this case), the Menu(); is the name of the menu to be opened.
Just search for

SmeltingHelpMenu

Near the top, copy it, press enter after it, and paste it - remember to change the void name to Menu…
Sigh.

Read full topic

alright there you go
